sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>New record instructions</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onDisplay(current, g_scratchpad) {
	/*
 	* When an access request is created, display some helpful instructions
 	* at the top of the form. If the form has been updated, then assume
 	* they no longer need the instructions.
 	*
 	*/
	
	var msg = 'Please review the records in the "Changes" list below. Items in a state of "Awaiting Justification" should be reviewed to ensure the proper justification has been provided. When you have completed your review, please click the "Request Approval" button to proceed.';
	
	if (new CumulusUtils().showMassApprovalButton(current) && current.sys_mod_count == 0)
		gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:12:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>21660962ff123100e921ffffffffff93</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New record instructions</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_21660962ff123100e921ffffffffff93</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 21:35:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=21660962ff123100e921ffffffffff93"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5806c562ff123100e921ffffffffff9c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_request</collection><condition/><description>Trigger events (notifications) based on certain conditions</description><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Cumulus request events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	/*
 	* Trigger notifications based on changes to the record
 	* Note: Events are automatically processed in the background
 	*
 	*/
if (current.active.changesTo(false)) {
gs.eventQueue('x_cd_cumulus.request.complete', current, current.getValue('number'), gs.getUserDisplayName());
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:10:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5806c562ff123100e921ffffffffff9c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cumulus request events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5806c562ff123100e921ffffffffff9c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 21:34:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5806c562ff123100e921ffffffffff9c"/></record_update>

 	* Trigger notifications based on changes to the record
 	* Note: Events are automatically processed in the background
 	*
 	*/
if (current.active.changesTo(false)) {
gs.eventQueue('x_cd_cumulus.request.complete', current, current.getValue('number'), gs.getUserDisplayName());

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_766251a2ff123100e921ffffffffffa4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</collection><condition>new CumulusUtils().countActiveEntitlements(current.getValue('request')) == 0 && current.active.changesTo(false) && current.request.active</condition><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Auto close parent request</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
/*
 * If the current entitlement record changes to Closed state,
 * check all the other entitlements that have the same parent
 * access request. If all the entitlements related to this
 * parent are closed, then automatically close the parent.
 * This saves the operator time of closing the parent access request
 * and avoids the case of an access request record being open
 * with no entitlements left to grant.
 *
 */
	new CumulusUtils().closeAccessRequest(current.getValue('request'));
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 18:04:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>766251a2ff123100e921ffffffffffa4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto close parent request</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_766251a2ff123100e921ffffffffffa4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-25 23:48:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=766251a2ff123100e921ffffffffffa4"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_84f64962ff123100e921ffffffffff24
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Import entitlements</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
	/*
 	* When a new access request record is created, (GlideRecord query) look up what
 	* the 'model after' user has for access and create the appropriate entitlement
 	* records with a type 'Existing' for audit purposes. These records must be
 	* available to the UI immediately.
 	*
 	*/
	var cu          = new CumulusUtils();
	var existingList = cu.getExistingEntitlements(current);
	
	cu.getEntitlementActions(current, existingList);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:14:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>84f64962ff123100e921ffffffffff24</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import entitlements</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_84f64962ff123100e921ffffffffff24</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 21:35:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=84f64962ff123100e921ffffffffff24"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8a774962ff123100e921ffffffffff79
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</collection><condition>current.state.changesTo(2)</condition><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Set WIP field values</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
	/*
 	* When the current entitlement record gets to Work in progress,
 	* set the approval field to Approved
 	* and the default assignment group if not already set.
 	* The default assignment group is: Service Desk
 	*
 	*/
	current.approval = 'approved';
	gs.addInfoMessage('>>>DEBUG: BR: Set WIP field values: updating ' + current.number);
	if (current.assignment_group == '')
		current.assignment_group = 'd625dccec0a8016700a222a0f7900d06';
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:16:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8a774962ff123100e921ffffffffff79</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set WIP field values</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8a774962ff123100e921ffffffffff79</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 22:11:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8a774962ff123100e921ffffffffff79"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_8dd291a2ff123100e921ffffffffff2b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</collection><condition/><description>Manage the triggered events (email notifications) for the entitlement process</description><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Cumulus entitlement events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
/*
 * Trigger notifications based on changes to the record
 * Note: Events are automatically processed in the background
 *
 */
if (current.approval.changesTo('rejected')) {
// Send the justification required message...
// if state changed back to Awaiting Justification
if (current.state.changesTo(12)) {
	gs.eventQueue('x_cd_cumulus.entitlement.justification', current, current.getValue('number'), gs.getUserDisplayName());
}}
// Check if it was rejected and notify accordingly
if (current.active.changesTo(false)) {

// If it's closed skipped (7) then send the rejection notice
if (current.state.changesTo(7)) {
		gs.eventQueue('x_cd_cumulus.entitlement.rejected', current, current.getValue('number'), gs.getUserDisplayName());
	}}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 18:06:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8dd291a2ff123100e921ffffffffff2b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cumulus entitlement events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8dd291a2ff123100e921ffffffffff2b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 21:33:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8dd291a2ff123100e921ffffffffff2b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_bd75c562ff123100e921fffffffffff6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_cd_cumulus_request</collection><condition>new CumulusUtils().countActiveEntitlements(current.getValue('sys_id')) == 0 && current.active</condition><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Auto Close request w/o entitlements</name><order>1000</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onAfter(current, previous) {
	/*
 	* The condition statement checks if all child entitlements
 	* have been closed and this (current) access request record is still
 	* active. If so, then it closes it.
 	*
 	* NOTE: This is similar to the BR 'Auto close parent request'
 	* but it is from the perpective that current is a x_cd_cumulus_request
 	* record and not x_cd_cumulus_entitlement.
 	*
 	*/
	
	current.state = 3; // Closed complete
	current.active = false;
	current.update();

	var parmList = [];
	
	parmList.push(current.getValue('number'));
	parmList.push(current.recipient.name);
	parmList.push(current.model_after.name);
	gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('x_cd_cumulus_auto_close_on_start', parmList));
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:09:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd75c562ff123100e921fffffffffff6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto Close request w/o entitlements</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bd75c562ff123100e921fffffffffff6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-21 23:25:31</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bd75c562ff123100e921fffffffffff6"/></record_update>

Construct a reference qualifier to be used in various places.</description><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>CumulusUserFilter</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function CumulusUserFilter() {
	
	return 'active=true';

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_79150922ff123100e921ffffffffff0b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cd_cumulus.CumulusAjax</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ajax Utilities to support the Cumulus request application</description><name>CumulusAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var CumulusAjax = Class.create();
CumulusAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	/*
 	* getManager - get the manager's sys_id and display name for the user passed in
 	*
 	* @param - none: accesses this.getParameter('sysparm_user_id')
 	* @returns - colon separated string: sys_id:Name
 	*
 	*/
	getManager: function() {
		
		var userID = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_id');
		var usr    = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		var answer = '';
		
		if (usr.get(userID))
			answer = usr.manager + ':' + usr.manager.getDisplayValue();
		
		return answer;
	},
	
    type: 'CumulusAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 17:07:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>79150922ff123100e921ffffffffff0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CumulusAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_79150922ff123100e921ffffffffff0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-25 19:13:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_df103822ff123100e921ffffffffff59
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_cd_cumulus.CumulusUtils</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>A collection of utilities to help manage the Cumulus request system</description><name>CumulusUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var CumulusUtils = Class.create();

CumulusUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.entitlementTable = 'x_cd_cumulus_entitlement';
        this.requestTable     = 'x_cd_cumulus_request';
        this.importTable      = 'x_cd_cumulus_entitlement_import';
        this.approvalTable    = 'sysapproval_approver';
    },
    
    /*
     * getExistingEntitlements - create a list of existing entitlements for this user
     *
     * @param parent - GlideRecord(this.requestTable)
     * @return array - list of entitlement attribute values the recipient currently has
     *
     */
    getExistingEntitlements : function(parent) {
        
        var impGr = new GlideRecord(this.importTable);
        var parentId = parent.getValue('sys_id');
        var userId = parent.getValue('recipient');
        var answer = [];
        
        gs.info('getExistingEntitlements(): userID={0}', userId);
        impGr.addQuery('user', userId);
        impGr.addQuery('active', true);
        
        impGr.query();
        gs.info('getExistingEntitlements(): {0} records found', impGr.getRowCount());
        
        
        while (impGr.next()) {
            var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
            entGr.newRecord();
            
            entGr.type            = 'Existing';
            entGr.request         = parentId;
            entGr.owner           = impGr.getValue('owner');
            entGr.attribute_name  = impGr.getValue('attribute_name');
            entGr.attribute_value = impGr.getValue('attribute_value');
            entGr.description     = impGr.getValue('attribute_description');
            entGr.target          = impGr.getValue('targetid');
            entGr.user_id         = impGr.getValue('user');
            entGr.active = false;
            entGr.setWorkflow(false);
            entGr.insert();
            answer.push(impGr.getValue('attribute_value'));
        }
        
        return answer;
        
    },
    
    /*
     * getEntitlementActions - create a list of actions to fulfill (add and optionally remove)
     *
     * @param parent - GlideRecord(this.requestTable)
     * @param xList - list of attribute values the recipient currently has
     * @return none
     *
     */
    getEntitlementActions : function(parent, xList) {
        
        this.getAddedEntitlements(parent, xList);
        if (parent.getValue('action') == 'Replace')
            this.getRemovedEntitlements(parent);
    },
    
    /*
     * getAddedEntitlements - find the entitlements the 'model after' (user2)
     *                        has that 'recipient' (user1) does not
     *
     * @param parent - GlideRecord(this.requestTable) - parent request record
     * @param list1 - list of attribute values the recipient already has
     * @return none
     *
     */
    getAddedEntitlements : function(parent, list1) {
        
        var user1 = parent.getValue('recipient');
        var user2 = parent.getValue('model_after');
        var parentId = parent.getValue('sys_id');
        
        // Go through what user2 has and ignore anything user1 already has
        var impGr = new GlideRecord(this.importTable);
        
        impGr.addQuery('active', true);
        impGr.addQuery('user', user2);
        impGr.query();
        gs.info('getAddedEntitlements(): {0} records found', impGr.getRowCount());
        
        while (impGr.next()) {
            
            var found = false;
            var count = list1.length;
            
            while (count && !found) {
                --count;
                gs.info('getAddedEntitlements(): attrVal={0} list1[{1}]={2}', impGr.getValue('attribute_value'), count, list1[count]);
                
                if (impGr.getValue('attribute_value') == list1[count]) {
                    gs.warn('IGNORE: {0} sys_id={1}', list1[count], impGr.getValue('sys_id'));
                    found = true;
                }
            }
            
            if (!found) {
                var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
                
                entGr.newRecord();
                entGr.type            = 'Change';
                entGr.action          = 'Add';
                entGr.request         = parentId;
                entGr.owner           = impGr.getValue('owner');
                entGr.attribute_name  = impGr.getValue('attribute_name');
                entGr.attribute_value = impGr.getValue('attribute_value');
                entGr.description     = impGr.getValue('attribute_description');
                entGr.target          = impGr.getValue('targetid');
                entGr.user_id         = impGr.getValue('user');
                entGr.justification   = parent.getValue('justification');
                entGr.active            = true;
                
                if (impGr.getValue('owner')) {
                    entGr.state = 12; // Awaiting Justification
                } else {
                    entGr.state = 2;  // Work in Progress (freebie)
                }

                entGr.insert();
                
                gs.info('ADD: {0}', impGr.getValue('attribute_value'));
            }
        }
    },
    
    /*
     * getRemovedEntitlements - get a list of entitlements user1 (recipient) has
     *                          that user2 (model after) does not
     *
     * @param parent - GlideRecord(this.requestTable) - parent request record
     * @param list1 - list of attribute values the recipient already has
     * @return none
     *
     */
    getRemovedEntitlements : function(parent, list1) {
        
        var user1 = parent.getValue('recipient');
        var user2 = parent.getValue('model_after');
        
        var parentId = parent.getValue('sys_id');
        
        // Go through what user1 has and ignore anything user2 has in common
        var impGr = new GlideRecord(this.importTable);
        
        impGr.addQuery('active', true);
        impGr.addQuery('user', user1);
        impGr.query();
        gs.info('getRemovedEntitlements(): {0} records found', impGr.getRowCount());
        
        while (impGr.next()) {
            
            var found = false;
            
            var usr1Gr = new GlideRecord(this.importTable);
            
            usr1Gr.addQuery('user', user2);
            usr1Gr.addQuery('active', true);
            usr1Gr.addQuery('attribute_value', impGr.getValue('attribute_value'));
            usr1Gr.query();
            
            if (usr1Gr.hasNext()) {
                
                gs.warn('IGNORE: {0} sys_id={1}', impGr.getValue('attribute_value'), impGr.getValue('sys_id'));
                found = true;
            }
            
            if (!found) {
                var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
                
                entGr.newRecord();
                entGr.type            = 'Change';
                entGr.action          = 'Remove';
                entGr.request         = parentId;
                entGr.owner           = impGr.getValue('owner');
                entGr.attribute_name  = impGr.getValue('attribute_name');
                entGr.attribute_value = impGr.getValue('attribute_value');
                entGr.description     = impGr.getValue('attribute_description');
                entGr.target          = impGr.getValue('targetid');
                entGr.user_id         = impGr.getValue('user');
                entGr.justification   = parent.getValue('justification');
                entGr.active            = true;
                entGr.state = 2;

                entGr.insert();
                
                gs.info('REMOVE: {0}', impGr.getValue('attribute_value'));
            }
            
        }
    },
    
    /*
     * showMassApprovalButton - determine whether to show the 'Request Approval'
     *                          on an access request
     *
     * @param aGr - GlideRecord(this.requestTable)
     * @return boolean (true=show the button)
     *
     */
    showMassApprovalButton : function(aGr) {
        
        var canWrite     = aGr.canWrite();
        var isRecipient  = (aGr.getValue('recipient') == gs.getUserID());
		var isRequester  = (aGr.getValue('opened_by') == gs.getUserID());
        var isItil       = gs.hasRole('itil');
        var awaitingList = this.getAwaitingJustificationEntitlementList(aGr);
        var hasAwaiting  = (awaitingList.length > 0);
        
        if (canWrite && (isRecipient || isRequester || isItil) && hasAwaiting)
            return true;
        else
            return false;
    },
    
    /*
     * setEntitlementToAwaitingJustification - reset the state of the entitlement ID
     *
     * @param entId - sys_id of the entitlement record to reset
     * @return boolean - (true=success)
     *
     */
    setEntitlementToAwaitingJustification : function(entId) {
        
        var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
		
        if (entGr.get(entId)) {

            entGr.state    = 12; // Awaiting Justification
            entGr.approval = 'rejected';
            entGr.update();
            
            return true;
            
        } else {
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('x_cd_cumulus_reset_entitlement_state_error', [entId]));
            
            return false;
        }
    },
    
    /*
     * getAwaitingJustificationEntitlementList - get a list of active child tasks in state 12
     *
     * @param parent - GlideRecord(this.requestTable)
     * @return array of sys_ids
     *
     */
    getAwaitingJustificationEntitlementList : function(parent) {
        
        var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
        var answer = [];
        
        entGr.addQuery('request', parent.getValue('sys_id'));
        entGr.addQuery('state', 12); // Awaiting Justification
        entGr.addQuery('active', true);
        entGr.query();
        
        while (entGr.next()) {
            answer.push(entGr.getValue('sys_id'));
        }
        
        return answer;
    },
    
    /*
     * setMassApproval - set the list of Entitlements awaiting justification
	 *                   from the previous function to Approval state (13)
     *
     * @param array of sys_ids
     * @return count of records updated
     *
     */
    setMassApproval : function(aList) {
        
        var count = 0;
        
        for (var i = 0; i < aList.length; i++) {
            
            var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
            
            if (entGr.get(aList[i])) {
                entGr.state = 13; // Approval
                entGr.update();
                ++count;
            }
        }
        
        return count;
    },
    
    /*
     * countActiveEntitlements - see how many active peers this entitlement has
     *
     * @param requestId - sys_id of a GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
     * @return integer - number of active records (-1 = error)
     *
     */
    countActiveEntitlements : function(requestId) {
        
        var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
        
        // Count how many records are still active
        entGr.addQuery('request', requestId);
        entGr.addQuery('active', true);
        entGr.query();
        
		var count = entGr.getRowCount();
		
		return count;
        
    },
    
    /*
     * closeAccessRequest - mark the request closed
     *
     * @param requestId - sys_id of a GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
     * @return none
     *
     */
    closeAccessRequest : function(requestId) {
        
        var aGr = new GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
        
        if (!aGr.get(requestId)) {
            gsAddErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('x_cd_cumulus_auto_close_error', [requestId]));
            return;
        }
        
        aGr.state = 3; // Closed complete
		aGr.active = false;
        aGr.update();
        
        var reqNum = aGr.getValue('number');
        gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('x_cd_cumulus_auto_close_request', [reqNum]));
        
    },
    
    /*
     * cancelRequest - cancel this request and any subtasks associated
     *
     * @param aGr - GlideRecord(this.requestTable);
     * @return none
     *
     */
    cancelRequest : function(aGr) {
        
        aGr.state    = 3; // Closed complete
        aGr.comments = 'Request cancelled';
        aGr.update();
        
        this.cancelEntitlements(aGr.getValue('sys_id'));
    },
    
    /*
     * cancelEntitlements - cancel all in flight entitlement tasks
     *
     * @param parentId - sys_id of the parent request
     * @return number of records affected
     *
     */
    cancelEntitlements : function(parentId) {
        
        var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
        var count = 0;
        
        entGr.addQuery('request', parentId);
        entGr.addQuery('active', true);
        entGr.query();
        
        while (entGr.next()) {
            var wf = new Workflow();
            
            wf.cancel(entGr); // Cancel the associated workflow context
            entGr.state    = 4;  // Set the state to Closed incomplete
            if (entGr.getValue('approval') != 'approved' &&
                entGr.getValue('approval') != 'rejected') // Preserve prior answers
            entGr.approval = 'cancelled';
            entGr.comments = 'Parent request cancelled';
            entGr.update();
            ++count;
        }
        
        return count;
    },
    
    /*
     * entitlementApprovalReminder - build a list of reminders satisfying the query,
     *                               trigger an event for approvals in the list,
     *                               and optionally cancel the approval.
     *
     * @param reminderDays - Number of days ago to look for requested approvals
     * @param eventName - Event to trigger if a record matches the criteria
     * @param cancelFlag - Cancel approvals we find?
     * @return - none
     *
     */
    entitlementApprovalReminder : function(reminderDays, eventName, cancelFlag) {
        
        var qString        = this._makeQueryString(reminderDays);
        var appGr          = new GlideRecord(this.approvalTable);
        var gdt            = new GlideDateTime();
		
        appGr.addEncodedQuery(qString);
        appGr.query();
        
		gs.debug('\n {0} qString={1} Reminder ({2} min) Event={3}', gdt.getDisplayValue(),
				 qString, reminderDays, eventName);
        
        while (appGr.next()) {
            
			gs.debug('Record: {0} sys_id={1} updated={2}', appGr.sysapproval.number,
					 appGr.getValue('sys_id'), appGr.getValue('sys_updated_on'));
            
            gs.eventQueue(eventName, appGr, reminderDays, cancelFlag);
            
            if (cancelFlag)
                this._cancelApproval(appGr, reminderDays);
        }
        
    },
    
    /*
     * _makeQueryString - construct a query string to get the right records
     *
     * @param val - look for records created 'val' days ago
     * @return string - encoded query string
     *
     */
    _makeQueryString : function(val) {
   
        var qString = 'sysapproval.sys_class_name=x_cd_cumulus_entitlement^' +
            'state=requested^' +
            'sys_created_onONReminderDay@javascript:gs.daysAgoStart(' + val + ')@javascript:gs.daysAgoEnd(' + val + ')';

        
        return qString;
    },
    
    /*
     * _cancelApproval - cancel the designated approval
     *
     * @param appGr - GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
     * @param reminderDays - number of days we waited for an action
     * @return boolean - true=success
     *
     */
    _cancelApproval : function(appGr, reminderDays) {
        
        var comments = 'Approval auto rejected after ' + reminderDays + ' days without action';
        
        appGr.comments = comments;
        appGr.state    = 'rejected';
        
        if (appGr.update()) {
            
            // And comment the task it is associated
            var entGr = new GlideRecord(this.entitlementTable);
            
            if (entGr.get(appGr.sysapproval)) {
                entGr.comments = comments;
                entGr.update();
            }
            
            return true;
            
        } else {
            
            return false;
        }
    },
    
    type: 'CumulusUtils'
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 15:43:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>df103822ff123100e921ffffffffff59</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CumulusUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_df103822ff123100e921ffffffffff59</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-21 23:24:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition/><description>Default access control on x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</description><name>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</name><operation display_value="create">create</operation><script/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-17 23:18:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>267dfa21ff123100e921ffffffffff53</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_267dfa21ff123100e921ffffffffff53</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-17 23:18:05</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>false</advanced><condition/><description>Default access control on x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</description><name>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-17 23:18:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2a7dfa21ff123100e921ffffffffff54</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_2a7dfa21ff123100e921ffffffffff54</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-17 23:18:05</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_96877526ff123100e921ffffffffffe4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Entitlement transform</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[/**
 * For variables go to: http://wiki.service-now.com/index.php?title=Import_Sets
 **/ 
target.active = true;

	// Disable obsolete names
	var obsoleteNameList = ['WEB_DEV', 'ORACLE_DBA'];
	var len = obsoleteNameList.length;

while (len) {
--len;
	if (source.u_attribute_name == obsoleteNameList[len]) {
		gs.log('>>>MATCH: len=' + len + ' source.u_attribute_name=' + source.u_attribute_name + ' listVal=' + obsoleteNameList[len]);
		
	target.active=false;
}
}]]></script><source_table>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement_import_set</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-02-20 20:46:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>96877526ff123100e921ffffffffffe4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Entitlement transform</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cumulus" source="x_cd_cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Cumulus">9207a321ff023100e921ffffffffff1e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_96877526ff123100e921ffffffffffe4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-02-20 20:50:48</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_cd_cumulus_entitlement_import</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
